quote: The Magical Negro rested his red cane on his shoulder and leisurely strolled into the forest to see if he could find him some hobbits, castles, dragons, princesses, and all that other shit.
quote_letters: THE MAGICAL NEGRO RESTED HIS RED CANE ON HIS SHOULDER AND LEISURELY STROLLED INTO THE FOREST TO SEE IF HE COULD FIND HIM SOME HOBBITS CASTLES DRAGONS PRINCESSES AND ALL THAT OTHER SHIT
